Text: I'm really sorry to inform you that i've made a copy (disk image) of the original dvd but i realised that it doesn't work properly, some sectors haven't been copied. Don't download this torrent, i'm converting the dvd into avi format (h264) and by the end of the day it should be completed (i don't have a high end pc, it takes some time). I will upload the final final. I'm really sorry for bothering you, i didn't tested the image, i was in a hurry, my mistake.
